Comment: We free up our queens and bishops with these moves...
We free up our queens and bishops with these moves...
We free up our queens and bishops with these moves...
We free up our queens and bishops with these moves...
...then we swap pawns, opening up the d-file...
...then we swap pawns, opening up the d-file...
...then I take his queen to force his king out of his initial position, so he can't castle...
...and he is forced to take mine.
Now I develop my bishop...
...he develops his knight...
...I develop my knight...
...he develops his bishop...
...and my last two moves allow me to castle queenside, instantly checking.
He brings out his other knight...
..then I fork its twin and his bishop...
...and we swap knights.
...and we swap knights.
Now I line up his pawn...
Now I line up his pawn...
...and remove it...
...and remove it...
...and his knight forks my rook and d-pawn...
...so I line up his bishop...
...then we swap bishops...
...then we swap bishops...
...and I lose my pawn.
I pin the knight down...
...so he covers it...
